cause.description:
Deliberation is a growing and flourishing concept. It refers to a variety of process to bring individuals and communities together, to discuss a wide range off issue. it is a way to get a better insight into our future and our common issues. It allows us to discuss a wide range of concerns, and to put different ideas on the table. For more infomation, you can visit www.thataway.org, to view the website of important deliberative group. We invite your participation.
1. Communities must discuss issues and problems openly.
2. The best way to address our society's common problems issues is through open dialogue and deliberation.
3. Our society can progress only if all groups are given a chance to makes their views and concerns heard.
cause.mission: Promote dialogue and deliberation, to strengthen society.
cause.name: Deliberative dialogue
